title: Bug 114470: Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter
description: When using the code 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the code 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The filter should accept the 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a valid value and not throw an error message.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the table filter.
3. Enter 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as the filter value.
4. Observe the error message being thrown.
